AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params._pool: The address of the pool. See `NFTPoolInfo`.
The address of the pool. See `NFTPoolInfo`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._pool: The address of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
The address of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._pool: addresses of pool to be updated.
The address of the pool. See `NFTPoolInfo`.

returns._poolInfo: Returns the pool that was updated.

params._to: Receiver of the LP tokens and syUSD rewards.

addPool(address[]).notice: Add a new NFT pool. Can only be called by the owner.

claim(address,address).notice: Claim proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.

pendingReward(address,address).notice: View function to see pending reward of user in pool at current block.

pendingRewardAtBlock(address,address,uin.notice: View function to see pending reward of user in pool at future block.

setTotalLockAmount(uint256).notice: set total locked token for lpSupply

totalLockAmount().notice: Total lock amount of users in VotingEscrow

updatePool(address).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool.

userInfo(address,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.

withdrawAndClaim(address,address).notice: Withdraw NFT token from pool and claim proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.
